评论详情: I love love love this set. I have it in almost every color available. The material is good quality and it is super cute yet comfy making it good for numerous occasions. The material is quite stretchy and will mold to any body type. I ordered a size XS and it fits good. The only thing is the back of the top has a little room by my bra area.

I purchased this in a size medium though a large may have been more comfortable for the top. The top fit, but was a bit too snug for my liking for a lounge piece though the material is comfy. The bottoms fit true to size. I am 5’6” and 135lbs with a 36” bust and 29” waist. This outfit is perfect for a casual summer day out walking the dogs, running errands or just lounging at home. The material is a waffle knit, light weight but quality material that is not see through. The color is as pictured and described. I’d recommend but if you’re bustier, I’d size up!

I work from home and was looking for some lounge sets that would be good for the summer months. I’ll say, I’ve ordered over sets in the past that DEFINITELY wound up being home-only lounge sets because of belly or booty coverage but I was so pleasantly surprised by this one! I’m about 190 lbs, 5’6”, hour glass figure and was torn between L or XL. I wound up going with the L and I’m really happy that I did. Perfect shorts coverage, just a small bit of my torso showing, surprisingly flattering. I’d be comfortable throwing on a denim jacket or cardigan over top and running errands. Oh and pockets and a true drawstring are a HUGE bonus.  4 stars because I think without the little discount I got using Prime, this set would be a little overpriced. It’s not the softest material upon first wear…like that waffle fabric. But it at least has nice structure. I can’t imagine it will hold up for a long time but, we’ll see!
My go to summer outfit. Cute yet comfy. Color is nice. Fabric is not too thin or thick. I got it in black as well.

评论概述: Super cute-but top is way too small
评论详情: The material is nice and comfortable I am 5'3", about 150/155 and I got a large. Shorts fit well, plenty of room. The top was VERY small. If you are a chesty girl this may not work for you, sadly sending back. Cute tho!
This is a cute casual fit, the color is beautiful and the fabric is of great quality, I ordered in another color!
So comfy and cute! Material is stretchy and thick. Love!!!

I love these!!! Fits well and looks great! I am a larger woman so I was a little concerned. Not now, it is actually very flattering and the fabric feels so good. It is just the perfect weight, it has been hot but the sleeveless top has kept me cool. I have washed these and I washed them on delicate and hung up to dry and there was not any color running or shrinkage. I couldn’t say what would happen if I washed in regular cycle. Great loungewear!

The material is on the thicker side I got a size medium for a little more room. Wish the shorts were slightly smaller.. I just make sure to tie the string tight. The do get heavier and droopy if you get them wet because of the material it’s made out of… but overall I still think this set is very comfortable and flattering.
Cutest little outfit but don’t put in dryer. Ordered a medium and after I washed it, I had to order a large
I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the waffle material of this set. Now I need all the colors!

Ended up returning this because the top was very tight and much shorter than it appeared in photos. Shorts were cute and comfy so I almost kept it just for the shorts. If you’re looking for a crop top outfit then you will like this set. It’s comfy and made well. Nice fabric too.

This set is so lightweight and comfortable.  It's a great spring/summer outfit and could be worn just about anywhere.  The sizing is perfect.  I ordered my normal street clothes size and they fit just fine, both the top and the bottoms.  I have washed and dried with my other garments and it has come out the dryer virtualy wrinkle free, I hang up and any leftover wrinkles just fall out.  It really is a wash and wear set.

评论概述: A little wonky on the top
评论详情: This set definitely does the job of a cute matching set. The top is a bit wonky at the neckline and does that thing where you feel like you're being chocked, but not, meaning it's one of those tops you can constantly feel on you. The overall quality of this set is great! it's waffle knit and very comfy for at home chilling .
Fits true to size and is so cute.
The shirts are a little in the long side, but overall it’s a cute set, esp for the price. I ear the top on its own too with jeans, etc.

Bought for a Disney trip to Animal Kingdom. I’m 5’5 & 150 lbs and 34B. The Quality of material is fantastic but the right side is it higher than the left. The tank is longer in the front and back and shorter on sides. I wish I had ordered one size larger for the top - as there is little to no stretch. The shorts have good elasticity in the waistband and are extremely comfortable.

Not sure what I was expecting. I actually like the set a lot (I bought a second one prior to this), however, when I put a stain treater on a small food splatter, it bleached the color out.  I’ve been using the same kid-safe, non-toxic, peroxide-free, chlorine-free, phosphate-free, biodegradable surfactant stain treater on my clothes for years and have never had this problem. Leads me to believe this set is not colorfast, so be careful.

Wearing this now months later! It’s super cute and so comfy. I feel like I wear it more than my other chill/pjs. The top is pretty short so if you are a heavy chested girl you won’t be able to lift your arms in it so be careful. The color has held perfectly and it’s a decent elasticity so it has for me perfect at different weights

I saw this outfit on IG and immediately had to get it. I am 5’9”, 180 hour glass shape (40, 30, 45). The size chart recommended a size L. However, I went with an XL so it would fit looser. I’m glad I did. Plus I wanted to account for shrinking after washing/drying. The material is more of a waffle texture. Not cotton knit or sweat pant material. Out of the package it smells so bad. Like play dough. I will definitely be washing before wearing. Overall I’d recommend this as loungewear. It looks like pajamas. I personally wouldn’t wear it out but people wear pjs outside these days so to each their own.

评论概述: Runs small. Top smaller than bottom
评论详情: This set is super cute but in order for it to fit on top i had to order bigger which made the bottoms bigger/baggy than i want. I still kept it but would have ordered more colors if the top was more size appropriate for the bottoms. Also feels more like a $20 price point- but inflation so… Im a medium/large (more a typical large right now) and had to exchange for an XL. The shorts are a bit baggy but luckily that’s in. Im 5’2”, 160lb, carry weight all over. Short n stiocky. I don’t think I’ll wear it alone without an open blouse over it in public bc Im 48 and my mid section is not in shape. The top is def cropped. But will be super cute with an open white blouse etc. (for those using as pj’s- I would not use as pjs bc top not loose & cozy. Too constrictive for me and not soft enough) But overall cute.  Another thing to note, it arrived in its original bag with no shipping bag over it. I didn’t love that. It felt like it could get stolen because you see what’s being shipped and left (more tempting) as well as might get dirty if things get inside the easily to open package.

I ordered a size large; the shorts and long cardigan fit perfectly. Everyone is right when they say the top is cut really small. If I ordered an x-large the shorts and cardigan would be too roomy but the top would fit better. I have large breasts and I definitely would have to wear a bra underneath for my nipped not peak under the bottom. But since it's for lounging I'm not going to be too picky but I would definitely wear the top separately with sweatpants, high waisted pants/jeans or Midi skirt (with bra of course..lol!? It's very soft material and I'm tempted to buy another one in a different color!

For ref I’m 5’1 105lbs. Got small. Top is good but shorts are a lil too big for my liking. If there was xs, prob be ok. I  washed in hot water and put in the dryer but it’s not 100% cotton so not much shrinkage. I tried this same outfit in the brand Zesica  on Amazon and theirs are 100% rayon and rayon will shrink just enough. They don’t have xs either but their small shorts are a tad smaller& just a wee bit shorter  & after washing & drying I’m happy
So comfy, cute, and casual! I have worn this so many times and I love it so much! Not see through, you can pull the shorts up to be super high waisted if you don’t want your belly to show.
Cute color but the top was really cropped. I did love the bottoms and ended up wearing a beige top instead.

I have a pear shaped body so the fact that the shorts are bigger than the top really works in my favor. I’m also short (5’) and was worried that the shorts might be too long but they actually hit at a very flattering length! The only thing I don’t like is that the material seems a bit cheap and it’s a bit hard, not soft like I was imagining it. Maybe it’ll be better once it’s washed. I hope it doesn’t fall apart quickly. I got a medium and I’m usually a small in things. Usually size 4-6 with B cup size and big ol’ hips.  Edit: changed this to five stars! After washing it becomes soft and this outfit is so cute I wear it ALL the freakin time!

Love this set!  Definitely buy if your hesitant!!  I ordered a large and I typically wear a 34DDD bra size and typically a Large in fitted tops and small-medium in bottoms.I can wear hanging around the house and I feel on trend and a little sexy but covered.  I'm not sure if I would wear out of the house... the waffle fabric feels very pj to me and is a bit heavy.  The top is more fitted on my because I am large busted and I like how loose the shorts are around the thighs.  I wasn't sure it work work for me but I really love it and washed several times with no issues or shrinking.

This is a large in the green color. Definitely fits like normally a large would for me, I’m usually a size 8-10 in jeans. Plenty of stretch in the waist band and long enough in the back, no butt cheeks showing. I was worried my bra straps would show in the front, but nope! Wearing a normal bra. Also thick enough that it’s not see-through. The material is a little cheap feeling but I’m hoping once I wash it, it’ll soften up some.

I have a curvy/ athletic figure. I have a broad back and wear a 36D bra and big thighs with a butt. With all that being said this set hugs me in the right places and does not reveal too much! The shorts are perfect! The cover my ass but are still cute! The shirt is a little more cropped than I initially thought, but I think I still look great!  I would get this in another color!
I wanted to love this set, but I just couldn't. I ended up returning it. First, it ran small. The fabric was scratchy for me, even though I thought it was going to be soft.

评论概述: Comfy and cute, but top runs small/short
评论详情: This is such a cute set! I love it for feeling a little more put together around the house, and I tossed on a jean jacket for a quick trip to the store. My only complaint is the top; if you have a larger than average chest it’s going to be SHORT. I was wearing a compression sports bra and this shirt barely covered it. There also isn’t a lot of stretch in the top, so the bottom hangs loose-ish instead of hugging your body. For reference, I’m 5’10, 165ish lb, 34F bra size, and usually between a medium and large depending on fit.

I just got this outfit in the mail and to be honest it is super cute and I feel very comfortable in it which is hard for me with cropped anything but especially tank tops. I would give it 5 stars but the only thing is the shorts are super long so I rolled them and will probably have my mom sew them to that shorter length.

评论概述: Three Piece Set is a different fabric
评论详情: I absolutely LOVE these 2 piece sets and they are all I have lived in this summer. Which I appreciated because it kept my cool and cute looking in the Texas heat. I was so excited when a 3 piece version came out but was disappointed when the one I ordered arrived. Unlike the thick waffle knit of the 2 piece sets, the 3 piece is a very thin, slinky material that has more of a striped pattern. While it is a cute outfit, it’s not what I was expecting based off of photos and the other sets
I like this set, but I bought an identical one from KDF on Amazon for cheaper. From what I can tell they are the exact same.

It looks alright, the shorts weren’t quite the long and baggy look I’d hoped for but the biggest problem for me was the way the fabric smells. I even soaked and washed it before wearing and it still has a rather unpleasant odor.
Used it for my airport outfit and it’s super light and comfortable and not restricting. True to size. I’m 4’11” 135lbs and bought a Medium.

Love this set. The material is soft and breathable. I’m an hourglass shape with wide hips and I got a large in the green. The shorts fit great. The top is more cropped than I like, but that’s personal preference. I ended up getting a second set in black in an XL and I mix and match the sets. The shorts still fit me well in XL. The top covers more real estate, but the arm holes look a little silly being so big on me and kind of bulging out.

评论概述: Super cute, ordered in multiple colors!
评论详情: My favorite vacation sets ever!! Never was big on cropped shirts but these are barely cropped and the shorts are super comfortable. I have thick thighs so shorts that ride up are always a concern but I had no problem with these since I wear compression shorts underneath. Super cute and breathable as well! I felt super cool walking around Old San Juan in 100-degree weather with no issues!
Love the fit and material! I’m 5’7 and 140lbs and medium is perfect!

This 3 piece set is so cute! I got an xxl and it fits perfect for me. The crop top is extra short because i am large chested, i wish it was just a touch longer and that is the only reason i gave 4 stars instead of 5. Also i wish they had more colors in xxl, only had the dusty pink at this time. The shorts and the duster both have pockets too!
I love the fit of this set. It’s a cute color, the quality is great and has held up after multiple washes

评论概述: Very cute but puckers and stretches out of shape.
评论详情: After one wear I saw the shirt material stretch and no longer has a fitted style around torso but rather puckers out. Probably will continue to shrink in wash and then stretch out with wear. Still really cute and comfy but it’s obviously not gonna last very long. Love the shorts though, it cinches at my waist (common problem with a small waist and big hips), has a great length to it, and good sized pockets so I feel comfortable wearing outside.
I overall liked it very much, the only issue is the top’s fit. It’s made to fit someone with more chest and back than me I ordered my size. But it is comfy and fits good enough to wear as loungewear.

I ordered this set to travel in and it was SO comfortable. It is very true to size, stretchy and the material is super nice! I don’t think it has shrunk really at all after all of the washes. The bottoms are high waisted which is always a plus, and for being 5’9 they are definitely long enough. I highly, highly recommend this set!

The material is very soft and it's very comfortable to wear around the house. Sizing is about as expected, but the top does feel like it runs a bit smaller. The texture (laces, trims, edges, straps) of your bra will be a little bit visible but I just wear this without a bra anyways. The shorts are drawstring so you can tighten/loosen the strings to adjust the fit somewhat.  I'm loving the set so much that I ordered another pair in black!

I really like how this set looks and feels! Just for a warning for my tall big chested girls; I am a 34 DD and 5’10” and there’s absolutely no way I can wear this shirt with a bra. It is very cropped and has no stretch, so if I lift my hands above my head, you will see a little bit of under boob. But other than that, I absolutely love this set.

Im usually size small and got a medium so it wasn’t too tight. Top fit perfect and the shorts were a little big but still cute! I loved the color too! I weight about 125lb 34B bra size and 5’1 for reference

This set is so cute, I love it. I was it on a delicate cycle and only dry it for a few mins before hanging it up. I am considering ordering it in a different color. True to size, slight crop on the top and the shorts are just a little lose but flattering. Have worn with white high socks and tennis shoes and flip flops. Cozy around the house or to run errands.

Very comfortable and stretchy. Would recommend for lounging around the house or running around town. The one thing I dont like is how baggy the shorts are. I ordered a medium 5'7 and 137lb fits good but wouldn't be able to size down for better fitting shorts due to the shirt fitting perfectly.
I do love this set the top is just a little too small on my bigger chest and sizing up would have made the pants too big for me! Bigger chests beware but if it’s a bed time fit with no bra it’s fine!

评论概述: bottoms true to size, top is tiny
评论详情: i like the style and feel of this outfit. the shorts fit like a large, the top is tiny and definitely a size smaller. i am going to keep it however line dry it to avoid it shrinking!

This outfit is so cute!!!!! It's soft and very comfortable! I got a medium rather than a small because someone posted a review saying to size up bc of the crop top. I didn't want it to be too short so I did but now I think I should have just gotten a small. I'm ordering another one in a different color in a small and see how that fits. The medium works fine for me but maybe the shorts wouldn't be too baggy. Overall though I love it!! I'm 5'0 at 117lbs for reference.

I absolutely love this! SIZE UP! If you want a looser fit size up. My true size is a small, and I ordered a med. I am 5’3 125lbs.  The fit of the shorts is perfect, and when you size up they are not tight around the legs, I am smaller chested, but since I sized up the shirt was a slit crop! Perfect family friendly outfit!

Love!! Very comfortable and just what I was looking for. I am 8 weeks postpartum (notice the spit up on the top lol) so I want to feel cute but also comfy while at home with the baby. Currently 160 and 5’10” and I ordered a M and it fits great. The top is on the shorter side but great for wearing at home and could toss on a cardigan if going out to run errands or anything. I plan to order more if they go on lightening sale again!

评论概述: These felt a little baggy but great color and material
评论详情: While I know the shorts are supposed to be loose, I felt like they were baggy in unflattering places. The length of the shorts and the top is great!  Word of warning for the more busty shoppers, this top will provide 0 support, but is great for lounging around the house.
Super comfy! I love the color too. My boobs are a B cup and the top looks a littler weird unless I’m wearing a regular bra and I have to cross the straps for it.
Super cute. I liked so much I bought a 2nd color. Fabric could be softer but for the price I'm not mad about it. Has gotten softer with washing.

Love this set and get so many compliments on it! My guy friend say “sav you look so comfortable. I wish they made sweat suits like that for men”. the top is also tight and thick enough that you can get away without wearing a bra if you’re a bit smaller up top (I’m a 34B.) the shorts are the perfect length and the waist band is snug but not too tight. Originally bought in grey and just ordered again in black 😁

This outfit it really cute and comfortable. I’m 5’9” and 165 lbs. I ordered this set in large for a casual girls weekend trip. I got many compliments and I styled it with a linen shirt, cute sneakers, and hoop earring. I love it! I’m going to order it in another color.

Wanted to buy an outfit to wear comfy at the airport while traveling. It was definitely comfortable and easy to travel in. I am very happy with the quality and the fit. I bought the perfect size for me! Can’t wait to buy more from this brand. I debated on buying a size up due to what the fabric was made out of. When you wash and dry this type of fabric it does shrink a bit. I did notice the top got more right but the shorts fit perfectly.

I am 5’7 and 160 lbs and ordered a medium and they fit really well! I bought the pink and sage green set and I love them! I would have given 5 stars but the pink set is kind of see through but the green is fine. I’m definitely considering buying more colors since these are so comfy.

Love this! The shorts are So comfy and cute and with pockets!! The top is cute but a bit small and it does not stretch well so I don’t wear it. Would be five stars if the top wasn’t a mini mini crop top.
JUST BUY IT SIS 😘
Loved them! Super soft material and stretchy!
They fit to size!
I love this two piece set. It’s cute and well made!

I have officially found my favorite lounge set. This set is cute and can also be worn outside of the house. I only wish the top was a tad bit longer but I still love it. These aren't see through either which is nice to know.
The top fits really small and it’s definitely cropped. The pink is much lighter in person.

I'm 5'5" (almost), 138 lbs and waist is 30", 34C. I bought the medium, it fits PERFECTLY. I didn't want a SHORT crop, which after reading the reviews sounds like if you go true to size the crop is too short.  It does not shrink if you wash on cold and I hang to dry. These are the cutest most affordable loungewears I have seen in a while. I got the blue color and it goes great with anything.
Top was shorter than expected

So many complements when wearing yesterday. 5’5”, ~160lbs, 34DDD Ordered L - fit great. Could have fit a M for but like the looser fit of L better. Love the color & waffle knit material! Perfect with a linen button down & sandals for a day running errands. Will be ordering more colors!
Perfect stylish comfortable travel outfit.

This set is so comfortable! I am B cup and the top is actually quite supportive without a bra. I wore it to a concert and felt great the whole night! It didn't dig into my underarm area, nor did it pinch my waist or belly. The shorts were the perfect fit on my waist, and there was no pinching on my thighs. This is a perfect lounge set, but still great quality to wear out too.

Took this out for a trip where we did lots of walking and it was supper comfy and cute for all the pics we took! Already added 3 more colors to my cart! Just buy it sis. I’m 5’4 160lbs and wearing a large.
Great quality, true to size

this is a really cute set for lounging. i would say it runs a little small, being a little too snug for my liking when it comes to being comfy. however it’s not unwearable. i am 5’5” 130 pounds and got a medium

Wore this to wear on a girls trip while lounging around/getting ready and it was perfect. I’ve only washed it once, but it did wash well. Loved that the shorts had pockets also and were a slightly longer fit.

I really like this short set.  It is comfortable and very flattering.  Material is soft but still keeps it’s form.  I’ve worn it on long travel days in the car and to run errands.  It’s a must for your closet.

It’s super comfy and can be taken from lounge to a day out outfit by adding some jewelry. It’s good quality for the price and fits good (even for the tall girlies:)) also love the color and waffle knit fabric!
Cute, comfy and good material!

评论概述: Stop reading and just buy it
评论详情: I was like you once, reading through the reviews trying to decide if this summer set was gonna be a flop or not. Seriously just buy it. It is incredibly flattering, soft, stretchy, light weight, and is now my favorite thing to wear. I am 5’8 and 120lbs, definitely true to size. I ordered a size small. BUY IT. You will have zero regrets. I will definitely be purchasing more of these.

I ordered in the light green and loved it so much I immediately ordered another in the blush pink! Unfortunately, I received a body suit style tank instead of the 2 piece lounge set and no option to replace item! Interesting mixup since they don’t even have an option for this item to purchase! Regardless of this mishap, the green set is so flattering and comfortable. I am 5”4, 190lbs and bought a large! Fits perfect, not too tight either.

评论概述: Cute, lighter material than I thought I'd be
评论详情: The material is very thin and feels a little cheap. It's pretty cute though.
Love the color and how comfortable this is..drawstring to help fit better. Good length as well
The fit was cute but the material didn’t feel of the quality I payed

This product fits my friend with a smaller build very nicely. As for me, I am 5’11 with a larger bust. The tank top fits very very short but the shorts are comfortable and roomy. I ordered an XL. I believe if I size up the shorts will be too big.

This was so hard to find something that’s having a great soft fabric especially for the summertime when you want to feel comfy this set is really stretchy well-made and beautiful color no issues of the washing

I ordered the black set in a size small. I am 109 lbs & these fit me in the top & bottom. They are the most comfortable set that I currently own. And also the most flattering. I was worried that the shorts might be a bit too big or baggy since I am short & petite but this was not the case.

The two piece set and the 3 piece set are completely different materials. The two piece set I got in blue and the material was very rough. I didn’t even try it on because I knew I wouldn’t like that material on skin. Maybe just not my texture. Ended up returning both sets I got. Didn’t find them flattering. 5’4” 200lbs.
This set was a gift for my sister! She loves it and said it’s super soft and comfy. The material isn’t too thick but for PJs it’s just fine. For the price, this was a great gift!
Really cute set! Had to wear a few times to make sure I liked it but very comfy. Shorts are a little long for my short legs but I guess that’s the style
So flattering and little lol. The nude fits a little more snug than the purple but I love it!!! I want it in every color seriously
The color is fabulous! It did not fit well with me. I am a size 8 with a longer torso so the shirt fit too cropped for me. The fabric is also not as soft as it appears

I really wanted to like this outfit but the first thing I noticed taking it out was how small the top is. the top is very tight around the neck also. I got the tan and it is also see through. I ordered a medium the bottoms fit but for lounge wear I’d like the top a little looser.

I am 5’2 and weigh 200lb. I have a pear shape, So most items I need to purchase a smaller top and a bigger bottom. I ordered the extra large just to be safe and it fits me perfectly, Both top and bottom! Will definitely be buying more colors.
Super cute and comfy. But be warned it does shrink a bit when washed. Even when washing it in cold water on delicate cycle, and not drying it.
Overall, this set is very cute. Comfort is good but not overly soft. Could easily pair this PJ set with a cute pair of sandals or kicks and wear it to run errands. Would recommend.

评论概述: Go ahead and get every color.
评论详情: This is my new favorite thing to wear! I just received the green yesterday, and I’m already ordering it in two other colors. Perfect for summer lounging, errands, or all the time at the beach. Save yourself the time and go ahead and get multiple colors! The shorts band is elastic with tie so you can tighten. I’m usually a 2-4, and the small fits perfectly!
This a for real around the house fit.its a cute style but the material is cheap and the color isn't flattering on my particular shade of brown skin.
I love this lounge set! It’s very cute and comfortable and good for the price.
